title: VA - (IBM) ITALIAN BODY MUSIC VOL.2 (2005)
description:
VA - (IBM) ITALIAN BODY MUSIC VOL.2 (2005)

ITALIAN BODY MUSIC

a project by Dj NOX and Luca Anselmi (ElectroWorld)

Title: IBM Vol.2 - ITALIAN BODY MUSIC
Genre: Electro, EBM, Noise, Ambient, Industrial
Release date: 23.12.2005

FREE NET RELEASE

Visit www.italianbodymusic.com for free download and more infos about the bands.


Tracklist:
01. Apotheke - Night Reveries
02. Babylonia - That Big Lie (Radiophobic Edit)
03. Bacteria - Earthquake
04. Bad Sector - Decode
05. Ballistic - Superstition (Twisted Reality Mix)
06. Maurizio Bianchi - The Great Tribulation
07. Digitalis Purpurea - Ideomatic (Tribute to Rockets)
08. Kingdom - Nostalgiestrasse 40 (Empty Rooms mix)
09. Morphine Shot - Holy War
10. Officina del Rumore - Hey Shakespeare Let&#039;s Party
11. The Fault - Automatic Death
12. Tour de Force - Wedding in Fusion
13. ViolentDiva - eL3kTRo sU1ciDe
14. Wertham - Sinking
15. ZeroAD - No Reason


--------------------                    --------------------                    --------------------

This compilation was born from the common interest and dedication of Alberto Brandi (Dj Nox, one of south Italy?s prime-mover EBM - Industrial DJs) and Luca Anselmi (founder and administrator of one of Italy?s major EBM - Industrial - Electro forum - webzine www.electroworld.tk) for the musical macrocosm related to the dark and alternative electronic music. The ?IBM? project wants especially to work as a way to actively promote the Italian scene, very articulate and various in its manifestations, ranging from 80?s related synth-pop to the new ways of 2000 Electronic Body Music, arriving to interesting mingling between metal sounds and electronic impressions.

?Italian Body Music? can be interpreted as a manifesto of the EBM-Electro made in Italy, somehow a confutation of the Italian xenophile complex, presenting some of the most promising and interesting acts from our Peninsula. This is not meant only for the hardcore-fans of the genre, but (mostly!) to the newcomers, in Italy and abroad.

In this spirit, the compilation presents tracks from already internationally-accomplished bands as well as young and promising acts that truly deserve to be listened, appreciated and supported through purchasing their records, merchandising and making the hell break loose at their concerts.

What to say more?

IBM it?s promotion, circulation, electro-pedagogy!

IBM it?s passion, stubbornness, sweat!

IBM it?s damned fine music!

So, move your ass and dance to the sound of the Italian Body Music!!
